job_description:
Company Description
Euphoric Thought Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is committed to technology modernization and development, with a relentless focus on performance and result-driven solutions for organizations. Driven by innovation, we approach challenges differently and emphasize thoughtful action and enthusiasm. Our services encompass Product Development, Cloud Management and Consulting, DevOps, ML/AI, ServiceNow Integration, Blockchain Development, and Data Analytics.
Role Description
This is a full-time, on-site role for a Sr. Dot Net Developer located in Bengaluru. The Sr. Dot Net Developer will be responsible for designing, coding, testing, and implementing software applications. Day-to-day tasks include developing software using .NET Core and ASP.NET MVC, engaging in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure high-quality deliverables.
Qualifications
Proficiency in .NET Core and ASP.NET MVC
Strong skills in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and Software Development methodologies
Experience in programming and coding
Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities
Ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
Relevant certifications and experience in the technology industry are a plus
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Pay: ₹800,000.00 - ₹1,400,000.00 per year
Benefits:
Health insurance
Provident Fund
Work from home
Schedule:
Day shift
Monday to Friday
Morning shift
Work Location: In person

We are hiring a Junior AI Engineer to assist in developing and deploying AI-driven
solutions. The ideal candidate should have a strong foundation in AI/ML techniques
and be eager to work on real-world projects.
Responsibilities:
 Develop and implement AI models for various applications.
 Support data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing activities.
 Conduct experiments to improve existing AI algorithms.
 Work with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into products.
 Stay updated on the latest AI trends and advancements.
Requirements:
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or a related field.
 Proficiency in Python and familiarity with AI libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch,
OpenCV).
 Basic understanding of neural networks, NLP, or computer vision.
 Ability to write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
 Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills.
Job Types: Full-time, Fresher
Pay: ₹600,000.00 - ₹800,000.00 per year
Work Location: In person

About Us:
Innovative Cursor, started in 2023, is a SaaS company crafting custom tech solutions for businesses and consumers. We build websites, mobile apps, games, AR/VR experiences, IoT systems, and enterprise software to boost growth and engagement. Our goal is to lead with innovation, delivering smart, user-friendly platforms that transform ideas into reality.
Job Summary:
We are seeking two skilled Go Developers with expertise in the Gin framework to design, develop, and maintain high-performance backend systems and APIs. This role will be pivotal in building scalable, efficient server-side applications, integrating with cloud services like AWS S3, and contributing to our diverse portfolio of projects, including web applications and enterprise solutions.
Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain server-side applications using Go and the Gin framework.
Build and optimize RESTful APIs to support seamless website functionality and third-party integrations.
Implement robust HTTP-based solutions with a strong understanding of HTTP fundamentals.
Work with AWS S3 for efficient storage, retrieval, and management of data.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot, debug, and enhance application performance.
Contribute to the development and customization of enterprise solutions as needed.
Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and adhere to project timelines for timely delivery.
Qualifications Required:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
Minimum 2 years of experience in backend development using Go, including internships.
Proven proficiency in the Gin framework for building scalable web applications.
Strong understanding of HTTP fundamentals and REST API development.
Hands-on experience with AWS S3 for cloud storage solutions.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Preferred:
Experience in ERP development, particularly HRMS or accounting systems.
Immediate joiners, notice period of maximum 15 days.
Contract Duration:
1-year contract
Salary:
₹20,000 - ₹25,000/- per month in hand
Number of Open Positions:
2
Benefits:
Remote work opportunity with flexibility to join from anywhere in India.
5 days work week from Monday to Friday.
Exposure to diverse, cutting-edge projects in web, ERP, and API development.
Collaborative and supportive team environment.
Job Types: Full-time, Contractual / Temporary
Contract length: 12 months
Pay: ₹20,000.00 - ₹25,000.00 per month
Benefits:
Work from home
Location Type:
Remote
Schedule:
Monday to Friday
Morning shift
Application Question(s):
Do you have have experience in backend development using Go, Gin framework, HTTP and REST API development? This is mandatory.
Are you comfortable with the salary range of 20k to 25k in hand per month?
Work Location: Remote

At Nielsen, we are passionate about our work to power a better media future for all people by providing powerful insights that drive client decisions and deliver extraordinary results. Our talented, global workforce is dedicated to capturing audience engagement with content - wherever and whenever it’s consumed. Together, we are proudly rooted in our deep legacy as we stand at the forefront of the media revolution. When you join Nielsen, you will join a dynamic team committed to excellence, perseverance, and the ambition to make an impact together. We champion you, because when you succeed, we do too. We enable your best to power our future.
This role will be part of a team that develops software interfaces with all the major TV streaming providers, and downloads tens of thousands of movies and TV shows from US and international platforms.
The Software Engineer is ultimately responsible for delivering technical solutions: starting from the project's onboard until post launch support and including development, testing and user acceptance.
Responsibilities
System Deployment:
Build new features in the existing video and meta-data asset capture systems.
CI/CD Implementation:
Leverage CI/CD pipelines for automated build, test, and deployment processes.
Ensure continuous integration and delivery of features, improvements, and bug fixes.
Code Quality and Best Practices:
Adhere to coding standards, best practices, and design principles.
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to maintain high code quality.
Performance Optimization:
Assist in the Identification of performance bottlenecks in both client-side and data upload components.
Optimize applications for remote/unassisted installation.
Team Collaboration:
Follow best practices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure a cohesive and unified approach to software development.
Security and Compliance:
Implement security best practices for both client and upload components.
Adhere to industry standards and regulations related to web application security.
Key Skills
Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience, minimum 2 years, in Client-side development expertise using ReactJs
Good understanding of CI/CD principles and tools.
Good problem-solving and debugging skills.
Good communication and collaboration skills with ability to communicate technical concepts
Utilizes team collaboration to contribute to innovative solutions efficiently
Other good to have skills
Exposure to the AWS tech stack.
Experience with Golang or Python.
Please be aware that job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by scammers seeking personal data or money. Nielsen recruiters will only contact you through official job boards, LinkedIn, or email with a nielsen.com domain. Be cautious of any outreach claiming to be from Nielsen via other messaging platforms or personal email addresses. Always verify that email communications come from an @nielsen.com address. If you're unsure about the authenticity of a job offer or communication, please contact Nielsen directly through our official website or verified social media channels.

About the Role:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated
DevOps Engineer
with 3 to 5 years of hands-on experience to join our growing technology team.
You will be responsible for supporting the development lifecycle by automating
infrastructure, enhancing CI/CD pipelines, monitoring systems, and ensuring
scalable, secure, and resilient deployments.
Key Responsibilities:
Design,implement and maintain scalable and secure CI/CD pipelines.
Automate infrastructure provisioning using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or
CloudFormation.
Manage and monitor cloud environments (
AWS preffered
, Azure, or GCP).
Set up and maintain container orchestration platforms (Docker, Kubernetes,ECS, etc.).
Collaborate with development teams to ensure smooth code releases and operational stability.
Improve system reliability and performance through observability, logging, and alerting tools.
Troubleshoot production issues and participate in incident response.
Enforce security best practices and compliance requirements.
Required Skills and Qualifications:
3-5 years of professional experience in a DevOps or Infrastructure role.
Proficient in scripting languages (e.g., Bash, Python, or Shell).
Hands-on experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI, etc.).
Strong experience with cloud platforms (preferably AWS, but Azure/GCP is
acceptable).
Solid knowledge of containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes,Helm)
Familiar with infrastructure as code (Terraform, Ansible, or similar).
Experience with monitoring and logging tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack, etc.).
Good understanding of networking, security, and system administration fundamentals.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments.
Familiarity with version control systems like Git and GitOps practices.
Certification in cloud platforms (AWS Certified DevOps Engineer, etc.) is a plus.
Experience with service mesh, secrets management, and performance tuning is advantageous.
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: ₹65,000.00 - ₹70,000.00 per month
Schedule:
Fixed shift
Application Question(s):
Are you comfortable with the salary?
How many years of Version Controlling experience do you have?
How many years of Containerization and Orchestration experience do you have?
How many years of CI/CD Pipeline experience do you have?
How many years of Automation Scripting experience do you have?
Do you have experience with monitoring tools?
How many years of Automate Infrastructure Tool Experience do you have?
Experience:
DevOps: 3 years (Required)
License/Certification:
AWS Certification (Required)
Work Location: In person

We are a funded startup looking for a talented
Unity Developer
to join our team in Kolkata. The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience in Unity 3D development, C# programming, and game mechanics. You will be responsible for developing, optimizing, and maintaining high-quality interactive applications and games for multiple platforms.
Responsibilities:
Develop and implement game mechanics, UI, and features using Unity and C#.
Optimize code and assets for performance across different devices.
Debug and troubleshoot issues to ensure smooth gameplay experience.
Collaborate with designers, artists, and other developers to create engaging experiences.
Integrate third-party SDKs, APIs, and plugins as needed.
Stay updated with the latest Unity features, tools, and best practices.
Requirements:
1-3 years of experience
in Unity game development.
Proficiency in
C# programming
and object-oriented principles.
Strong understanding of
game physics, animations, UI/UX, and 3D environments
.
Experience in
AR/VR, multiplayer networking (Photon, Mirror), or mobile game development
is a plus.
Knowledge of
Unity Asset Store, shaders, and optimization techniques
.
Familiarity with
version control tools (Git, SVN)
.
Ability to work in a team environment and meet deadlines.
Preferred Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in
Computer Science, Game Development, or a related field
.
A gamer at heart.
Experience in
iOS/Android deployment
and knowledge of platform-specific requirements.
Passion for gaming and interactive applications.
Salary: Competitive and based on experience
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Pay: ₹12,083.45 - ₹30,000.00 per month
Benefits:
Flexible schedule
Health insurance
Schedule:
Day shift
Supplemental Pay:
Performance bonus
Yearly bonus
Ability to commute/relocate:
Behala, Kolkata, West Bengal: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred)
Application Question(s):
Share some of the work/portfolio links that you have worked on.
What is your favourite game and what do you like about it?
Experience:
Unity: 1 year (Preferred)
Work Location: In person
Expected Start Date: 01/06/2025

Job Title:
Data Science Intern
Location:
Trivandrum
We are looking for a motivated
Data Science Intern
to join our team and gain hands-on experience working with real-world datasets and advanced analytics techniques.
Key Responsibilities:
✓ Assist in analyzing large datasets using tools like Python (Pandas, NumPy) and R to identify trends, patterns, and actionable insights.
✓ Develop, test, and implement machine learning and deep learning models using frameworks such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or Keras to support business decisions.
✓ Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Marketing, IT, and Operations to understand data requirements and deliver insights.
✓ Create dashboards and visualizations using tools like Tableau, Power BI, or Python libraries (Matplotlib, Seaborn) to effectively communicate findings.
✓ Perform data cleaning, preprocessing, and validation to ensure accuracy using SQL and scripting languages.
✓ Stay updated on emerging tools, technologies, and trends in data science and deep learning.
Preferred Qualifications:
✓ Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or related fields.
✓ Strong foundation in statistics,
machine learning, deep learning, and data modeling.
✓ Proficient in
Python or R programming
.
✓ Experience with data visualization tools: Tableau,
Power BI
, Matplotlib, Seaborn.
✓ Familiarity with
SQL
and database management.
✓ Knowledge of cloud platforms such as
AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud
is a plus.
✓ Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
What We Offer:
✓ Hands-on experience with real-world datasets and projects.
✓ Mentorship from experienced data science professionals.
✓ Potential opportunity for full-time employment based on performance.
Experience:
Freshers are welcome
Duration:
3 months
If you’re interested,
apply now!
Job Types: Full-time, Fresher, Internship
Pay: From ₹8,000.00 per month
Benefits:
Flexible schedule
Provident Fund
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Work Location: In person

We are hiring a Junior AI Engineer to assist in developing and deploying AI-driven
solutions. The ideal candidate should have a strong foundation in AI/ML techniques
and be eager to work on real-world projects.
Responsibilities:
 Develop and implement AI models for various applications.
 Support data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing activities.
 Conduct experiments to improve existing AI algorithms.
 Work with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into products.
 Stay updated on the latest AI trends and advancements.
Requirements:
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or a related field.
 Proficiency in Python and familiarity with AI libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch,
OpenCV).
 Basic understanding of neural networks, NLP, or computer vision.
 Ability to write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
 Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills.
Job Types: Full-time, Fresher
Pay: ₹600,000.00 - ₹800,000.00 per year
Work Location: In person

Hiring for Equity Research Analyst
Job description:
· Sector-wise industry analysis including financial ratios, growth outlook, regulatory/ govt impact, valuation multiples
· Bottom-up research on target companies – based on annual reports, quarterly financials, review of various investor resources like concalls, public domain searches
· On-ground research – management meetings, plant visits, dealer / store visits, industry sources
· Financial excel modelling with basic valuation & return analysis
· Writing brief research notes with investment recommendations
· Daily tracking of news/ corporate announcements and Quarterly tracking of results
· Other office/ admin/ compliance work
What we are looking for
: Someone who has:
1. 2 year work experience in the field of equity research
2. Keen interest & passion in investing & equity markets
3. Decent ability for fundamental research and understanding of financial statements, ratios, valuations
4. Basic operational knowledge of MS Excel functions and data analysis and ability to use softwares like Screener, ACE Equity, etc.
About the role:
· Research Analyst Role – Full Time
· Mon - Fri: 9am-7pm; Saturday half day.
· Location: Work from office - located at Marine Drive, Mumbai
· Salary: 40,000 – 50,000 per month – based on profile & interview
About Native Capital:
Native Capital is an investment firm focussed on investments in micro, small & midcap listed companies. We are in the process of applying for a Portfolio Management Service (PMS) license with SEBI.
Our Investment approach is bottom-up fundamental research of undiscovered/ out of favour companies, where there is a margin of safety. We are based in Mumbai.
Naysar Parikh is the Founder & Managing Partner of Native Capital. Prior to starting this firm in Jan, 2022, he was the Vice President at The Carlyle Group (a US-listed global Private Equity firm with over $350bn AUM). At Carlyle he worked for 5 years in the India investment team and led several growth & buyout investments across various sectors - including marquee deals like Piramal Pharma, SBI Cards, SBI Life Insurance, PNB Housing Finance, Delhivery Logistics, Metropolis Healthcare. Prior to that, he was a management consultant with Boston Consulting Group (BCG). By education, he is a rank-holder Chartered Accountant.
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: ₹500,000.00 - ₹700,000.00 per year
Application Question(s):
Have you completed your CA or CFA course?
Experience:
total work: 2 years (Required)
Work Location: In person
Application Deadline: 25/05/2024
Expected Start Date: 01/07/2025
